name: Dr. Md. Firoj Hossain
experience: Assistant Professor, Mugda Medical College & Hospital, Dhaka.
Resident (Endocrinology), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU), 2014-2019.
Assistant Registrar (Medicine), Cumilla Medical College & Hospital, 2011- 2013.
Assistant Surgeon, Upazilla Health Complex, Sreenagar, Munshiganj, 2009-2011.
training: Life member of Bangladesh Endocrine Society.
General Member of Association of Clinical Endocrinology & Diabetology, Bangladesh.
Member of American Association of Clinical Endocrinology.

name: Ms. Jayoti Mukherjee
education: UGC-NET Qualified in JUNE 2019 with a percentile score of 97.97.
Two year National Service Scheme Course in Graduation.
training: Participated in Ministry of Women and Child Welfare Nutrition awareness program in 2017.
Participated in NON-ALCOHOLIC FATTY LIVER DISEASE : 2ND NATIONAL CONCLAVE ON EMERGING THERAPIES in 2018.

name: Dr. Rajib Kumar Saha
education: MBBS degree from Sir Salimullah Medical College and Mitford Hospital (SSMCH).
MRCP (UK) from Royal College Physicians of United Kingdom, London and MCPS (Medicine) from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons.
MD (Chest) from National Institute of Diseases of the Chest and Hospital, Dhaka (NIDCH).
Asian pacific society of respiratory medicine in Vietnam; Advance course on interventional pulmonology in Chennai, India and Interventional pulmonology, pulmonary function test in NIDCH.
Consultant of Respiratory Medicine in SSMCH; COVID-Center, Mohanagar General Hospital; Ibn Sina and Medinova Medical Services.
Asgar Ali Hospital as Consultant-Respiratory Medicine and serving patients regularly.
training: He is skilled in performing Interventional Pulmonology namely Fiber optic bronchoscopy (FOB), Bronchial biopsy, Pleuroscopy & pleural biopsy, Thoracocentesis, Chest tube insertion and Endotracheal intubation.
Dr. Saha also participated in different conferences and seminars in home and abroad.
specialization: Medicine & Chest Specialist and Interventional Pulmonologist

name: Dr. Salina Mahmud

workshop on Severe Acute Malnutrition,Dhaka Shishu Hospital.
books: Surface antigen (HBsAg) Negative Hepatitis B Virus in Bangladesh: Warrants for the Screening of Blood Donors.
